title: The Orphan: The First Book of the Beast
description: The werewolf is a creature of the night, a solitary, fur-covered thing. A wild-eyed, five-clawed beast with a taste for blood and the soft crunch of bone between the teeth.But as little Robert, the werewolf has been adopted by a kindly old farmer and his wife. Neither Robert nor the monster could control the shifting of its form, and always, the emerged beast lurked within, ready to spring for the throat...
author: Robert Stallman
